Your GitHub profile now includes multiple animated pixel art characters and other cool animated elements!

### ğŸ­ Animated Pixel Art Characters

1. **Developer Character** - Animated pixel art character coding/working

## ğŸ”§ Customization

### Change Character Positions
Edit the `<div align="center">` sections in README.md to rearrange characters.

### Add More Characters
You can add more animated characters by using:
```markdown
<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/8bithemant/8bithemant/master/svg/animations/[character-name].svg" alt="Description" width="200"/>
```

Available characters from 8bithemant:
- `developer.svg` - Coding character
- `rocket.svg` - Rocket/launch
- `gamedev.svg` - Gaming character
- `typing.svg` - Typing character

### Change Character Sizes
Adjust the `width` parameter (e.g., `width="200"` or `width="400"`)

## ğŸ¨ Color Scheme

All animations follow your green theme (#00FF00):
- Dark background (0D1117)
- Green accents (00FF00)
- White text for readability

## ğŸ“ Notes

- All pixel art characters are SVG animations (lightweight and scalable)
- Characters load from reliable GitHub repositories
- All animations are optimized for performance
- Works on both light and dark GitHub themes
